ratings.comment: Prof. Jones was awesome, I wish she taught more courses. Her exams are very fair, open note and she makes it clear that she's 'not trying to trick you.' her attendance policy is also very fair and she's accessible. she brings in a real client and you're able to list it as an internship. hands down best marketing course at UW;everyone should take it

The class was very inapplicable to the real world, and I learned very little about marketing. I did not enjoy the class, and the entire grade was weighted on one group project that she gives no feedback on throughout the semester. She will meet with you and say that you are on the right track and then blindside you with a below average grade.

I really enjoyed having Prof. Jones. She brings in real clients for a real campaign, and you can list this as an internship on your resume. She was great with feedback and grading and she was accessible. She overall was just very nice and extremely knowledgable. I would definitely take with her again.

Aziza is an awesome professor! She is very passionate about her students. The class is super easy, with 2 open note exams, participation, and a group project that is a campaign. It got a little boring sometimes, but was overall a super fun and easy class!
